import React from 'react' import { PRIDE_ICON, RELIABILITY_ICON, HUMANITY_ICON, INCLUSIVITY_ICON, HEALTH_ICON, POLICY_ICON, MATERNITY_ICON, PLAN_ICON, MILESTONE_ICON } from '../../constants/SiteElements' const Testimonials = props => { const { icon, authorname, description } = props return (

Testimonials

{authorname}

{description}

) } export default Testimonials
